ezvcard

Class Ezvcard.HtmlWriterChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.Ezvcard.WriterChain
      • ezvcard.Ezvcard.HtmlWriterChain
  • Enclosing class:
    Ezvcard

    public static class Ezvcard.HtmlWriterChain
extends Ezvcard.WriterChain
    Convenience chainer class for writing HTML vCards (hCard).
